roleset.name: alike

role.descr: first thing that is similar (or all things)
characteristic that args 1 and 2 hold in common

example.name: both constituents in arg1
example.text: Look at Irish citizenship laws , it would probably end up [*]being quite similar .

example.name: both args
example.text: The sweet, mildly pronounced flavor of Mahi-Mahi is similar to swordfish.
example.arg: The sweet, mildly pronounced flavor of Mahi-Mahi

example.name: similarity-n
example.text: There are of course some similarities and overlap between them.

roleset.note: SIMILAR-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1. (from similar.01-j)
